de.iss.mv2.security

Class AESWithRSACryptoSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.iss.mv2.security.AESWithRSACryptoSettings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable<MessageCryptorSettings>, MessageCryptorSettings

    public class AESWithRSACryptoSettings
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageCryptorSettings
    The default cryptographic settings using the AES-algorithm for symmetric and the RSA-algorithm for asymmetric encryption.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer

      • getSymetricEncryptionStream

        public java.io.OutputStream getSymetricEncryptionStream(java.io.OutputStream baseStream,
                                                        byte[] key,
                                                        byte[] iv)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                                        CryptoException
        Description copied from interface: MessageCryptorSettings
        Creates an output stream for encrypted data output. The stream must be fully initialized.
        Specified by:
        getSymetricEncryptionStream in interface MessageCryptorSettings
        Parameters:
        baseStream - The underlying stream.
        key - The key to use for encryption.
        iv - The IV to use for encryption.
        Returns:
        A fully initialized stream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        CryptoException - Is thrown if there was an error during the initialization of the encryption.
